file.name: swagger.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
    title: Template for nodejs
    description: description
    termsOfService: https://localhost:8059/terms
    contact:
        email: example@email.com
    license:
        name: Apache 2.0
        url: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html
    version: 1.0.0
externalDocs:
    description: Find out more about Swagger
    url: http://swagger.io
servers:
    - url: http://localhost:8059/
tags:
    - name: user
      description: information about user
paths:
    /:
        get:
            tags:
                - user
            summary: verify whether the app is working
            description: this route gives you information about the app
            operationId: getstarted
            responses:
                200:
                    description: Operation unsuccessfull
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                type: object
                                properties:
                                    error:
                                        type: string
                                        example: 'true'
                                    message:
                                        type: string
                                        example: Something went wrong!
                                    payload:
                                        type: object
                                        properties: {}
                                        example: {}
                201:
                    description: Operation Successfull, resource created
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                type: object
                                properties:
                                    error:
                                        type: string
                                        example: 'false'
                                    message:
                                        type: string
                                        example: Congratulations! We were able to
                                            fetch your app data.
                                    payload:
                                        type: object
                                        example: {}
                400:
                    description: Invalid input
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiErrorResponse'
components:
    schemas:
        UserCredentials:
            type: object
            properties:
                first_name:
                    type: string
                    example: John
                last_name:
                    type: string
                    example: Snow
                email:
                    type: string
                    example: john.snow@got.us
                password:
                    type: string
                    example: gotis4<34
                confirm_password:
                    type: string
                    example: gotis4<34
                google_recaptcha:
                    type: string
        User:
            type: object
            properties:
                uid:
                    type: string
                    example: hstnwi6wbs5g
                usename:
                    type: string
                    example: johnsnow
                first_name:
                    type: string
                    example: John
                last_name:
                    type: string
                    example: Snow
                about:
                    type: string
                    example: I am a Programmer
                picture:
                    type: string
                    example: https://images5.alphacoders.com/415/thumb-1920-415296.jpg
        ApiErrorResponse:
            type: object
            properties:
                error:
                    type: boolean
                    example: true
                message:
                    type: string
                    example: Your entries are not valid!
                payload:
                    type: object
                    properties: {}
                    example: {}
        ApiSuccessResponse:
            type: object
            properties:
                error:
                    type: boolean
                    example: false
                message:
                    type: string
                    example: Your account information was updated successfully!
                payload:
                    type: object
                    properties: {}
                    example: '#/definations/User'
    securitySchemes:
        petstore_auth:
            type: oauth2
            flows:
                implicit:
                    authorizationUrl: http://petstore.swagger.io/oauth/dialog
                    scopes:
                        write:pets: modify pets in your account
                        read:pets: read your pets
        api_key:
            type: apiKey
            name: api_key
            in: header
